How does Hippo Site Toolkit 2 work?
How does Hippo Site Toolkit 2 work? Delve into Hippo Site Toolkit howto HST HowtoLearn how to build a website using Hippo Site Toolkit.
This Howto guide uses a hands-on approach to let you learn how to build a website using Hippo Site Toolkit step by step. It describes a number of small tasks that you will need to perform while building your website. You can either follow them all in chronological order, or go directly to the task you want to learn about.
If you do not know where to start, start with Start a project.
If you are looking for detailed information on a specific component of Hippo Site Toolkit, see the reference guide.

What is Hippo Site Toolkit 2?
What is Hippo Site Toolkit 2? The Hippo Site Toolkit 2 (HST2) is undergoing a major revision, to make building sites even more easy. This documentation will be updated after the revision. But you can already get an idea of the what you (already) can do with the Hippo site toolkit 2 by checking out the example blog HST2 project at blog project.
